name: CancelSelectTextDraw
warnings: *This function calls OnPlayerClickTextDraw with INVALID_TEXT_DRAW (65535). Using this function inside OnPlayerClickTextDraw without catching this case will cause clients to go into an infinite loop.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Cancel textdraw selection with the mouse

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that should be the textdraw selection disabled

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SelectTextDraw: Enables the mouse, so the player can select a textdraw
 TextDrawSetSelectable: Sets whether a textdraw is selectable through SelectTextDraw
 OnPlayerClickTextDraw: Called when a player clicks on a textdraw.
related_cb: OnPlayerClickTextDraw: Called when a player clicks on a textdraw.
